form_response:
What happened was, in the morning, I did my evening puja, and in the evening, I did my morning puja because of time constraints in the morning. The morning puja is one hour long, so I couldn't afford to do that because I woke up late. So, I completed the puja and everything, and I fixed the errors in this workflow. That's as much as I did today.

Throughout class, I was able to do a bit of work on this, so now I plan to spend more time on this, update and deploy the dashboard that has to do with this workflow, and once that is ready, I can basically update my resume and apply for Google Internships, which is the whole reason why I am focusing on this right now.

And Bhagavad Gita classes haven't started yet, so I didn't take any. That's about it. I will continue to work on the other things right now, and for now, this is just a test entry to check whether the workflow gets triggered or not. Once it gets triggered, then I can continue to work on the dashboard and other such things. That's what this is about.

If possible in the future, I will try to integrate something where the continuous periodic notifications are not sent through Pushbullet but through WhatsApp because WhatsApp makes you feel a lot more like you need to open it and do it immediately. That's how I want to integrate this workflow into my daily progress and everything. So, yeah. 

I sang a few songs here and there. It doesn't count as formal music practice, but it still counts. If I have time after this, I will do music practice. If not, then I will sing a few more songs in order to make that count as music practice.
completed_activities: Attended College (and worked on project during class), Completed Evening Puja (re-scheduled to morning), Completed Morning Puja (re-scheduled to evening), Fixed errors in workflow, Did informal music practice (sang songs), Set up/tested workflow for daily progress tracking
missed_activities: Fresh up (scheduled slot on Dec 27), Evening Puja (scheduled slot on Dec 27), Study Block 1 (Dec 27), Gita Classes (Dec 27), Study Block 2 (Dec 27), Formal Music Practice (scheduled slot on Dec 27)
valid_reasons: Woke up late (reason for puja rescheduling), Gita classes haven't started yet

gita.devanagari: योगस्थः कुरु कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा धनञ्जय ।सिद्ध्यसिद्ध्योः समो भूत्वा समत्वं योग उच्यते ॥ ४८ ॥
gita.transliteration: yoga-sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṁ tyaktvā dhanañ-jaya siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṁ yoga ucyate
gita.translation: Perform your duty equipoised, O Arjuna, abandoning all attachment to success or failure. Such equanimity is called yoga.
